description: Partial pproval of Details pursuant to Condition 38 (Landscaping scheme) of Full Planning application Ref: P2013/1667/FUL dated 13 December 2013 for  extensions and alterations and associated re-cladding to 207-211 Old Street,(including additions at roof level) refurbishment and change of use of Empire House to provide A3/A5 restaurant use at basement and ground with office (B1)/Hotel (C1)/ private members club(Sui Generis) above, creation of part 2, part 3 storey buildings to provide additional B1 and A1,A2, A3, A4, floorspace, and creation of new pedestrian link from Old Street to Baldwin Street with associated landscaping and associated works.
decision_conditions: It should be noted that this consent forms a partial discharge of condition, and relates to the area of land adjacent to 213 Old Street only. Further information is required relating to the remainder of Phases 1 and 2 of the approved scheme (P2013/1667/FUL) with relation to Condition 38, including relevant information relating to parts A - K of this condition.
